name: OpenMinds
description: OpenMinds is a learning platform that instantly transforms any content (your content or 3rd party content) into engaging learning apps.  Your students play the apps on any platform to learn and master specific skills, such as vocabulary, spelling, grammar, punctuation and much more.

apis.name: OpenMinds
apis.description: OpenMinds is a learning platform that transforms user content into learning applications. The application is then accessible to students and tracks their individual performance. The service is pre-loaded with over 5000 items for language arts(grades k-8) that are aligned with Common Core standards. The API can retrieve, created, edit, or delete data within a users resource folder. The API uses REST calls and will return JSON or txt.
